advisory.name: RLBA-2021:4508
advisory.synopsis: lsscsi bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for lsscsi is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation
Enterprise Linux 8.5 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: Is it a problem that the wwn displayed by lsscsi is missing the last character?
